heading.text: Before we get started – which of the following best describes you?

responses: I know someone who is going to college

heading.text: Nice to meet you!

Your newfound independence is going to mean many new responsibilities. Normally, do you make your own appointments or pay doctors’ bills?

responses: No, someone else has done that for me
I've never been to a doctor

heading.text: That’s great! But there’s still a lot to know as you venture out by yourself. Maybe we can help.
Well, that’s pretty common for people going to college. But now you will have to take care of yourself. Maybe we can help.
Wow, you must be healthy! But chances are you’ll have to make an appointment or pay a doctor’s bill at some point. Maybe we can help.
Let’s begin with some questions about you. At some schools, the Aetna Student Health Plan is only available for full-timers. Are you a part or full-time student this year?
Are you a graduate student?
Soon enough, friend. You’re on your way! First, let’s learn more about how student health insurance works.

Schools sometimes provide a stipend for graduate students to use towards the cost of health insurance, but your school may require your stipend be used towards the cost of an Aetna Student Health plan.
Be sure to conﬁrm how your individual school handles this. But ﬁrst, let’s learn more about how student health insurance works.
Have you ever needed serious medical care?

But, if you did need treatment, you’d want to be covered.  An unforeseen medical problem could easily be a financial problem for years to come. And no one needs the extra worry when they’re unwell. Let’s ﬁnd out why and how you can protect yourself against that.

But, if you did need treatment, you’d want to be covered. An unforseen medical problem could easily be a ﬁnancial problem for years to come and no one needs extra worry when they’re unwell. Let’s ﬁnd out why and how you can protect yourself against that.
Basically, any medical care you recieve costs money. Doctors, nurses and hospitals all need to get paid.
That’s why people get health insurance. When you have medical expenses, the insurance company will often pay part of the bills, making the parts you’re responsible for much easier to handle.
Do you have medical insurance right now?
What type of plan are you on?

responses: Something else or I don't know

heading.text: Staying on that plan may be a good option for you. But there are some good reasons you should consider the Aetna Student Health plan. Let’s take a look at how health plans work.
Hmm, sounds like you might be a perfect candidate to consider an Aetna Student Health plan! Let’s take a look at how health plans work.
Medical plans have a group of doctors and hospitals that have agreed to work with that plan and accept certain rates for their services. That group is called a "network."
Did you know that if you see a doctor who isn’t in the network, the charge can be high?
If your plan doesn’t offer coverage outside its network, you could be responsible for the full cost.
In the case of an Aetna Student Health plan, the network would be the Aetna Preferred Provider network. It’s made up of lots of doctors and specialists — all over the country.
Most conveniently, the Aetna network usually includes the student health center on campus. This is the ﬁrst place to go to if you need medical attention. Unless it’s an emergency, of course.
If it turns out you need more care than the student health center can provide, they will usually refer you to a local doctor who’s in the network.
One more note on networks, some can be very small. You should make sure that the plan you’re currently on has in-network doctors near your school.
If not, you may need to run home for any non-emergency care.
Luckily, the Aetna network has doctors almost everywhere and you’re covered wherever you go, all year. Your coverage also includes trips to other countries.

Insurance plans cover some of your costs for medical services, but that usually doesn’t kick in right away. Many medical plans have an amount of money that you need to pay first. This is called a "deductible."
These can be low, or upwards of a thousand dollars. Your school's Aetna Student Health Plan will likely have a deductible, but it's usually pretty reasonable.
Now, to join an insurance plan, you’ll need to pay what’s called a "premium." Two people might have very different premiums based on how likely they are to use their plan’s coverage.
If you are younger, your premium will most likely be lower than an older person, simply because they are more likely to become ill.
One thing you can do with insurance is add your dependents – which means your spouse or children.
Do you have any dependents?
When you compare medical insurance options, what do you think is the most important to consider?

Well, all are important.
But one of those factors could be more important than the others to any given person. The best way to compare medical plans is to look at all the elements.
Find a premium with that has coverage and a deductible that suit your needs, and a network that includes doctors and hospitals wherever you may need one.

Also, look at any other features the plan offers, like coverage for prescription drugs or vision care
Remember, you can tailor your insurance to your own needs.
Aetna's one of the most trusted names in health insurance. Aetna plans come with a lot of features to make it easy to use and save you money.
Aetna’s one of the most trusted names in health insurance. Aetna plans come with a lot of features to make it easy to use and save you money.

Aetna’s one of the most trusted names in health insurance. Aetna plans come with a lot of features to make it easy to use and save you money.

And depending on where you’re going to school, Aetna Student Health plans may include, vision insurance or dental insurance, or offer them as add-ons. Some plans even offer you the chance to get life insurance.

Of course, you have to balance your budget at college. Before
being directed to school specific information, this tool will show you how Aetna Student Health insurance compares to
Health Exchange plans.
An Aetna Student Health insurance plan may be the best alternative to other plan options. Use this tool to compare your family, employer, or exchange plan to the student health insurance plan.
Earlier, you mentioned that a parent has been involved in making some of your decisions. Why not send them to this site for more information?
Of course, the additional features an Aetna Student Health plan offers vary from school to school. Would you like to see a quick overview of how you might benefit from an Aetna plan?

Don’t forget, you don’t have to enroll now. If you lose coverage, or need to enroll later — you can.

You don’t have to say no forever!

www.aetnastudenthealth.com
